channel.description:
## Reference Websites
**Digitalfire** https://www.digitalfire.com
**Julia Galloway's Field Guide for Ceramic Artisans** http://ceramicsfieldguide.org/
Vince Pitelka's Syllabi and Handouts https://sites.tntech.edu/wpitelka/handoutsinformation/
----------
## Online Classes
**Ceramic Materials Workshop** http://www.ceramicmaterialsworkshop.com/learn-online.html
* [Full Courses from Alfred University](http://www.ceramicmaterialsworkshop.com/full-courses-from-alfred-university.html) * [Free Youtube Videos](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCX2HmYyFhDJm41TByPVcckQ) * [Glazed and Confused: Understanding the Unity Molecular Formula](https://app.ruzuku.com/courses/17968/enroll)
----------
## Instructional Videos
**John Britt Pottery** http://johnbrittpottery.com/product-category/booksdvds/
----------
## Youtube Videos
* [Hsin Chuen Lin](https://www.youtube.com/user/hsinchuen): Hundreds of videos covering all aspects of pottery making, from the very basics to more advanced techniques.
----------
## Discussion Groups & Forums
**Clayart Archives**
* [2014-Present Archives](https://lists.clayartworld.com/pipermail/clayart/) Google search: "reduction firing" site:https://lists.clayartworld.com/pipermail/clayart/ * [1996-2008 Archives in forum](http://archives.clayartarchives.com/) Google search: "reduction firing" site:http://archives.clayartarchives.com * [?-2012: http://potters.org](http://potters.org) Google search: "reduction firing" site:http://potters.org
**Ceramic Arts Daily Forum**
http://community.ceramicartsdaily.org
**Facebook Groups**
* [Open Source Ceramics](https://www.facebook.com/groups/opensourceceramics/) * [Ceramic Recipes](https://www.facebook.com/groups/disisdkat/) * [Clay Buddies](https://www.facebook.com/groups/503156473036283/)
----------
## Podcasts
http://thepotterscast.com
http://carterpottery.blogspot.com
